casebody.data:
Janet K. Bernhard et al. v. Planning and Zoning Commission of the Town of Westport et al. (11274)

Daly, O’Connell and Foti, Js.

Argued February 8 — decision released March 2, 1993 Christopher J. Smith, for the appellants (plaintiffs). Leo Nevos, with whom, on the brief, was Jamie K. Gerard, for the appellees (defendants 300 Post Road West Associates et al.). Patricia E. Curtin, for the appellee (named defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
